channel.title: Disconnection error !PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
hey guys i am currently making an rsps but i have this problem where i keep disconnecting all the time. here is an image of what the error is: [img]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/errorhelp.jpg[/img] and here is another image of another error i found: [img]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/errorhelp2.jpg[/img]
it happens to me usually when i get to the home area.
here is a picture of my ::home area if it helps:
[img]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/pictureofhomewhereerrorishappening.jpg[/img]
sometimes it doesnt disconnect me but other times it does.
i was wondering if someone could please tell me what the error is and how to fix it.
it doesnt just happen in ::home it happens in other places and sometimes it happens when you attack something.
so can you please help me fix it or tell me what it is?.
Regards, mrpopyman
